name: Abhay Mittal

projects.title: Metapass Auction Site
projects.description: Built the front-end for Metapass Auction Site. Used React, and TailwindCSS.

projects.title: Stable Diffusion Web App
projects.description: Developed a web-app in react for Stable Diffusion 1.5. Used the huggingface Inference Endpoint for Backend/API.

projects.title: Prompt Marketplace
projects.description: It is an NFT marketplace for prompts. Prompts are sentences that are 'novel' and can be used to generate useful content with AI generators.

projects.title: Voice based COVID-19 Diagnosis
projects.description: A web-app for COVID-19 diagnosis. The app uses neural networks and sound processing to distinguish positive and negative cough samples.

aboutpara:
My name is Abhay and I am a 23-year-old who loves problem-solving. I am an Engineer who graduated in 2021 with a specialization in Computers / Software. Ever since I got my first computer as a child, I was always curious about it and I just went down the rabbit hole of codingüòõ. 

After my graduation in 2021, I joined a company called nice.com, which has several products in cloud and feedback management. There my role was pretty diverse and I got to work as a full-stack dev where I built everything from front-end pages to backend and APIs, DevOps pipelines and even wrote automation scripts. üßë‚Äçüíª

In my free time, I enjoy staying active and healthy through activities such as gym, fitness, boxing, chess, and cycling. I believe that staying fit allows me to bring my best self to my work as a developer and in all aspects of my life.üèãÔ∏è

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to thousands of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Built the client application for Stable diffusion from scratch with features such as TOS Login Authentication Premium mode etc

Primarily focused on the product: Satmetrix ‚Äì A feedback management enterprise software.,  Wrote several modern theme pages in React as part of a new feature(Web Intercept) and Introduced a new microservice to an existing monolithic architecture , Built CI/CD pipelines in Jenkins and used the Robot Framework to create and maintain automation scripts.

experiences.position: Research Intern at Center for Police Research
experiences.bullets: Worked on the project: Automatic License Plate Recognition System

education.universityPara: B.E (IT Engineering) 2017-2021 CGPA: 8.66 Elective Courses taken: Business Analytics and Intelligence, Soft Computing, Internet and Web Programming, Social Media Analytics
